thesis: Accelerating AI infrastructure demand keeps price leadership intact while technicals remain in a high-probability breakout configuration.
technical_snapshot: Offline snapshot captured 2024-03-15 from TradingView showed price at $875, 50-day SMA at $823, and 200-day SMA at $568, confirming a sustained golden-cross structure.
Relative strength index held at 58 with positive volume trend, indicating controlled momentum rather than exhaustion according to MarketSmith export from 2024-03-15.
fundamental_snapshot: Q2 FY2024 revenue reached $13.51B (+101% YoY) with data center revenue up 171% YoY as reported in NVIDIA's Aug 23, 2023 earnings release.
Company guided Q3 FY2024 revenue to $16B Â±2% highlighting visibility into AI accelerator demand (Reuters, Aug 23, 2023).
news_snapshot: Reuters (Feb 21, 2024) noted cloud providers locking in NVIDIA supply, reinforcing demand visibility into 2024.
Bloomberg (Mar 8, 2024) highlighted ongoing enterprise AI rollouts catalyzing additional GPU orders.

thesis: Azure AI monetization and resilient enterprise demand align with constructive technical structure for continuation.
technical_snapshot: 2024-03-15 Finviz export showed price at $413 with 50-day SMA at $400 and 200-day SMA at $360, reflecting an intact uptrend.
Accumulation/distribution rating remained A- per IBD MarketSmith data pulled 2024-03-15, indicating institutional sponsorship.
fundamental_snapshot: Microsoft's FY2024 Q2 results reported revenue of $62.0B (+18% YoY) with Intelligent Cloud revenue up 20% YoY (Microsoft earnings release, Jan 30, 2024).
CEO Satya Nadella highlighted over 53,000 Azure AI customers with one-third new to Azure (earnings call transcript, Jan 30, 2024).
news_snapshot: CNBC (Feb 13, 2024) detailed Microsoft's expanded Copilot rollouts to Microsoft 365 enterprise customers.
Wall Street Journal (Mar 5, 2024) reported continued enterprise AI spending prioritizing Azure services.

thesis: GLP-1 portfolio momentum and pipeline catalysts keep the stock in a constructive base with rising accumulation.
technical_snapshot: TradingView capture on 2024-03-15 showed price at $780 with 50-day SMA $745 and 200-day SMA $620, reflecting constructive base breakout support.
RSI printed 60 with expanding average true range contraction prior to recent breakout per MarketSmith snapshot 2024-03-15.
fundamental_snapshot: Eli Lilly reported Q4 2023 revenue of $9.35B (+28% YoY) driven by Mounjaro sales (earnings release, Feb 6, 2024).
FDA approved Zepbound for chronic weight management in Nov 2023, expanding GLP-1 addressable market (FDA announcement, Nov 8, 2023).
news_snapshot: Reuters (Mar 4, 2024) highlighted supply expansions to meet GLP-1 demand through 2024.
Bloomberg (Feb 28, 2024) reported health insurers broadening coverage for Lilly's weight-loss drugs.
